thread.title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
thread.title_full: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides

title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
text: > Entertainment Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, a large room that once had a fountain is seen through a window at the sprawling main mansion of the Duke Farms estate in Hillsborough Township, N.J. The debate over whether the unoccupied main mansion that tobacco heiress Doris Duke once called home should be demolished concluded on Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015. The Hillsborough Township Historic Preservation Commission ruled that structure is beyond economical repair and should be taken down. (AP Photo/Mel Evans, File)
